Spacing examples
################

working spaces
==============

.. if:: l1 == 1

   Working spaces.1.1 shall not be in the output.

.. else::

   Working spaces.1.2 shall be in the output.

.. if:: l1 == 1

   Working spaces.2.1 shall not be in the output.




.. else::

   Working spaces.2.2 shall be in the output.

.. if:: l1 == 1

   Working spaces.3.1 shall not be in the output.
.. else::

   Working spaces.3.2 shall be in the output.


working spaces
==============

.. if:: l1 == 1

   Working spaces.4.1 shall not be in the output.

.. hello comment

.. else::

   Working spaces.4.2 shall be in the output.

.. if:: l1 == 1

   Working spaces.5.1 shall not be in the output.

.. hello comment
.. hello comment
.. else::

   Working spaces.5.2 shall be in the output.
